definitions.definition: A man who engages in sports; an athlete .
A man who engages in country sports , such as hunting or fishing.
A man who exhibits good sportsmanship , or who exhibits sportsmanship as specified (good or bad).

main_definition: ( UK ) A man who engages in sports; an athlete .
secondary_definitions: ( dated ) A man who engages in country sports , such as hunting or fishing.
A man who exhibits good sportsmanship , or who exhibits sportsmanship as specified (good or bad).
